photos.title: On usage of my photographs
photos.photo.alt: Panorama of City of London during The Shard’s opening laser show
photos.explanation.1: You must have landed on this page after spotting a link in one of my photos (e.g. on
photos.explanation.3: ). If you are wondering about the usage terms, here are a few hints:
photos.hint1.1: Check if a page with the photograph contains a link to the origin or mentions the license. Most of my works are shared under
photos.hint1.3: , meaning that they are free even for commercial use.
photos.hint2: If you hold a downloaded copy, look into EXIF data for the licence type.
photos.hint3.1: If you would like to get a higher-resolution version, remove the watermark or use the photograph under specific terms, please
photos.hint3.2: drop me a line via email
